error.signature: TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'useContext')
error.regex: Cannot read properties of null.*useContext|Cannot read property.*of null.*useContext

verdict.summary: React hooks internals are null — usually multiple React copies or calling hooks outside component.

dead_ends.why_fails: Usually not a version issue — it's duplicate React installations

dead_ends.action: Wrap everything in a new React.createContext
dead_ends.why_fails: The issue is React internals, not your context

workarounds.action: Check for duplicate React: npm ls react — should have only one copy
Ensure hooks are called from a React function component, not a regular function
If using linked packages, ensure they resolve to the same React instance

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'TypeError' is a hook_error error while 'Error' has a different failure mode despite similar symptoms. Check error message details to differentiate.
